item.title: Teaching Statement
item.description: I love to train the next generation of hydrologists and environmental scientists. It is my belief that every student is capable of tasting the passion that I feel for hydrologic modeling by becoming a practitioner in the exploration of hydrological theories, researches and models. I had three undergraduate sessions of teaching on Geography Information System years ago. My teaching philosophy rests on three tenets: simplifying the complexity with mathematics, realizing ideas with programming, and integrating students in research.
